page.title: 11HEAVYGOODS FERRIED-SCORAIG
page.content: TO FERRY TRACTORS,TRAILERS OR OTHER BIG THINGS ACROSS THE LOCH YOU HAVE TO MAKE A CATAMARAN.IT HAS TO BE DURING GOOD WEATHER AND HIGH TIDE OR IT WOULD BE DIFFICULT TO DRIVE THE TRACTOR ON AND OFF THE PIER. A CATAMARAN IS MADE BY JOINING TWO BOATS TOGETHER WITH PLANKS ACROSS THEIR HULLS SO THAT YOU CAN DRIVE THE TRACTOR ON.YOU HAVE TO PUT AN ENGINE ON EACH BOAT.BOTH PROVIDE POWER BUT ONLY ONE IS USED FOR STEERING. ONCE A STONE CRUSHER WAS BROUGHT ACROSS THE LOCH.HUGE BUOYS WERE BORROWED FROM THE NAVY AND ATTACHED TO IT SO THAT IT DID NOT SINK. THEN IT WAS TOWED BY EIGHT BOATS POWERED BY OUTBOARD ENGINES.
